snippet: The 2014 Mercedes-Benz B-Class Electric Drive is the company’s first battery-electric car, but it is not a spartan green vehicle. In terms of its interior fit and finish, the car will feel right at home in a Mercedes showroom.
abstract: Mercedes-Benz's 2014 B-Class Electric Drive, luxury brand's first battery-electric vehicle, boasts the acceleration and amenities that consumers have come to expect from manufacturer.
lead_paragraph: The 2014 Mercedes-Benz B-Class Electric Drive is the company’s first battery-electric car, but it is not a spartan green vehicle. In terms of its interior fit and finish, the car will feel right at home in a Mercedes showroom.

headline.main: Electric, but Not Bragging About It
headline.print_headline: Electric, but Not Bragging About It
